column4: i have been using ubuntu for long time since 4.10 and a few days ago i got a cd with ubuntu 6.06 and when i put the cd on my pc in order to install it the live cd cd started and then when it was to enter the gnome i hear the sound but the monitor says out of range and i cannot see nothing. Can i start the installaion only without to start the livecd? answer private please
